full_summary:
### Summary
This Request for Proposal (RFP) aims to engage a staffing consultant with required professional services for Immigration and Refugee Board of Canada (IRB). The project is a Request for Proposal against a Supply Arrangement (SA), open to qualified bidders from the  E60ZT-18TSPS Tier 1 category, with a maximum bid limit of $3.75 million.

### Background
This RFP cancels and replaces the previous solicitation number 20230816-IRB dated September 14th, 2023, with a closing of October 19th, 2023, at 2:00 pm ET. Evaluations are currently underway for the previous solicitation.

### Business Requirements
The IRB requires services from a staffing consultant under the Human Resources Services stream. The proposed services will be provided under the Task-Based Supply Arrangement and are expected to last from the contract award date to September 30th, 2025. The contract will also include an irrevocable option to extend the resulting contract for a period up to 18 additional months under the same terms and conditions.

### Security and Trade Agreements
The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement,  Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

### Technical Requirements
The proposed services will include:

* Staffing Consultant, four (4) Senior Resources (Level 3).

### Mandatory Documents
No documents are associated with this RFP.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The best value proposal will be selected and a contract will be awarded as a result.

### Submission Information
Only Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who are qualified under Tier 1 ($0 - $3.75 million) for the required categories will be invited to bid. Interested parties can contact the contracting authority, Steve Dessureault, by phone at 514-249-2780 or by email at [steve.dessureault@irb-cisr.gc.ca](mailto:steve.dessureault@irb-cisr.gc.ca).
